title: Replace hero section image with uploaded Fish Edit image

requirements.summary: Replace the current hero section logo image with the uploaded 'Fish Edit.png' image in the Home page component
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded Fish Edit.png image appears in the hero section of the Home page
The image maintains proper responsive sizing and positioning within the hero layout
The existing flag motifs and other hero elements remain unchanged

file_operations.description: Update the hero section image reference to use the uploaded 'Fish Edit.png' asset instead of the current logo image. Preserve all existing hero layout structure, flag motifs, CTA buttons, and responsive sizing behavior. Update the image import path to reference the uploaded asset file.
